title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 359.3 - Employees who acquire eligibility on return to work after unemployment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 359.3 - Employees who acquire eligibility on return to work after unemployment

State Regulations

An employee who, during any period of eligibility to
benefits under subdivision 2 of section
207
of the Workers' Compensation Law has returned to employment with a covered
employer, and any employee who, while currently receiving unemployment
insurance benefits or immediately following entitlement to disability benefits
has returned to employment with a covered employer, shall be eligible for
benefits, to be provided by the employer, immediately on such
employment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
359.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
